com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.scenes

Class SceneDifficulty

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.scenes.SceneDifficulty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scene

    public class SceneDifficulty
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scene
    SceneDifficulty. Represents the difficulty menu where the player choices a diffculty before the start of the race.
